coding.title: Debugging Assistance
coding.prompt: Help me identify and fix bugs in this code snippet. Provide detailed explanations on what might be going wrong and how to resolve it.

coding.title: Refactor Code
coding.prompt: Suggest improvements to refactor this code for better readability, maintainability, and performance without changing its behavior.

coding.title: Write Unit Tests
coding.prompt: Generate unit tests for the following code using best practices and appropriate testing frameworks.

coding.title: Explain Algorithm
coding.prompt: Explain the algorithm implemented in this code, including its time and space complexity.

coding.title: Optimize SQL Query
coding.prompt: Analyze this SQL query and suggest optimizations to improve its performance on large datasets.

coding.title: Security Review
coding.prompt: Perform a security review of this code snippet. Identify vulnerabilities or risks and provide mitigation strategies.

coding.title: Code Documentation
coding.prompt: Generate clear and concise documentation for this code, including function descriptions, parameters, and return values.

coding.title: Language Specific: Pythonic Improvements
coding.prompt: Suggest Pythonic improvements for this code snippet following PEP 8 and idiomatic practices.

coding.title: Language Specific: JavaScript Best Practices
coding.prompt: Review this JavaScript code and suggest best practices and modern ECMAScript features to improve it.

coding.title: Explain Error Message
coding.prompt: Explain the cause of this error message in the context of the provided code and suggest how to fix it.

coding.title: Implement Feature
coding.prompt: Implement the following feature based on the requirements described: [insert requirements].

coding.title: Code Style Enforcement
coding.prompt: Check this code snippet for style guide compliance and suggest fixes to align with [e.g., Airbnb JavaScript Style Guide].

coding.title: Concurrency and Parallelism
coding.prompt: Explain how concurrency or parallelism is handled in this code and suggest improvements if needed.

coding.title: Memory Management
coding.prompt: Review this code for memory management issues such as leaks or inefficient usage and provide recommendations.

coding.title: API Design Review
coding.prompt: Evaluate the design of this API code and suggest improvements for usability, scalability, and security.

coding.title: Legacy Code Modernization
coding.prompt: Suggest how to modernize this legacy codebase using current technologies and design patterns.

coding.title: Explain Design Patterns
coding.prompt: Identify and explain the design patterns used in this code and their benefits.

coding.title: Visual Studio Debugging
coding.prompt: Provide best practices for debugging C++ and C# projects using Visual Studio, including breakpoints, watch windows, and memory diagnostics.

coding.title: Visual Studio Build Configuration
coding.prompt: Explain how to configure different build configurations in Visual Studio, such as Debug and Release, and their impact on performance and debugging.

coding.title: Visual Studio Extensions
coding.prompt: Describe how to create and deploy Visual Studio extensions using the Visual Studio SDK and MEF framework.

coding.title: Visual Studio Code Tasks and Launch Configurations
coding.prompt: Guide me on setting up tasks and launch configurations in Visual Studio Code for automating builds and debugging.

coding.title: Visual Studio Code Remote Development
coding.prompt: Explain how to use Visual Studio Code Remote Development extensions to develop inside containers, remote machines, or WSL.

coding.title: Visual Studio Code Snippet Creation
coding.prompt: Show how to create custom code snippets in Visual Studio Code for faster coding.

coding.title: Visual Studio Code Debugging Tips
coding.prompt: Provide tips and tricks for effective debugging in Visual Studio Code, including breakpoints, conditional breakpoints, and variable inspection.

coding.title: Visual Studio Code Git Integration
coding.prompt: Explain how to use Git features within Visual Studio Code, including commits, branches, merges, and resolving conflicts.

coding.title: Visual Studio Code Extensions for Coding Productivity
coding.prompt: Recommend essential Visual Studio Code extensions for improving coding productivity and quality.
